text: Miguel de la Quadra-Salcedo y Gayarre (April 30, 1932 - May 20, 2016) was a Spanish journalist and Olympic athlete. He was born in Madrid. He was the director and founder of cultural program Aventura 92 (Adventures 92). He was mainly known by the Basque-Navarre people. Quadra-Salcedo died in Madrid on May 20, 2016 at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== *VideoConference Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Spanish journalists Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Writers from Madrid
title: Miguel de la Quadra-Salcedo
